title: About Me
text: Fascinated in technological developments, I enjoy reading up about technological innovations and learning new technical skills. I am a self-motivated individual who actively seeks new opportunities by stepping out of my comfort zone to challenge myself on a daily basis. I strongly believe in teamwork, as well as pursuing a value adding and meaningful career.

title: About Me
text:
Work Experience

Software Developer
AXS Pte Ltd, Singapore
June 2024 - Present


Core Backend Team
LAMP Stack
Involved in the backend dealing with settlements between business organisations and AXS
Gained experience with various programming languages and tools.




Software Developer Intern
Schroders Asset Management, Singapore
MAY 2023 - AUG 2023


Technology: Python, AWS Services
Proof-of-Concept event-driven system for managing investment model weights, which required a solid understanding of event-driven architecture and the AWS server-less Stack
Experience with AppSync, EventBridge, CloudFormation, Lambda, DynamoDB, GraphQL
Wrote Integrated Test Cases
PoC system proposed to the CTO, demonstrating its ability to be leveraged to enhance the efficiency and responsiveness of a core component of Schroders investment platform




Data Analytics Intern
Schroders Asset Management, Singapore
MAY 2022 - AUG 2022


Technology: Snowflake, PowerBI, Tableau, SQL
Wrote a Proof-of-Concept paper on Snowflake
Adopted a business use case to produce and demonstrate insights from a historical dataset
Utilised PowerBI and Tableau to create insightful dashboards using Schroders’s
